title: Will the traditional skins be available to buy again ?
body: It seems the only way to get the Traditional skins for {{champion:43}} {{champion:113}} {{champion:48}} is through the Mystery Gift, currently. Will they be available to buy again without using the gambling system?

replies.body:
Hiya! 

At this time, we don't have plans to make them available in the store.

*Edited to correct info!

No, they were in the store for a short time when the reworks were released I remember it.  They were given out for free if you already owned them but they were in the store for 975 each if you didn't already have the champion.

Oops, you're right! 

As far as them coming back, we don't have plans to do so in the foreseeable future.
Weren't traditional skill available durning the annual legacy vault open days, though?
No, they've never been there sadly.  *still wants Trundle the only one I didn't own at the time >_<*
I swear I've seen Traditional Karma in the shop long after her relaunch.
She was in the store for a short time after the relaunch but they've never come back during a legacy sale.
